ul.li: Monday, March 23, Stringtown will still be providing breakfast and lunch to students. Fill out this survey and share with any families. This will help us get a count on meals to be made. Please, if your student is picking up their meals, wait outside the lunchroom and they will be handed out there. We appreciate your support and patience during this time. School Closure Child Nutrition Survey

Please take the time to fill out this survey. This is our school climate survey for parents. It is completely anonymous; we are looking for honest feedback from all our parents here at Stringtown Public Schools. Please take the time to fill out this survey. Thank You for your responses. School Climate Survey
